fields.Title: PLAZA / GRAFFITO
fields.Description:
There's a giant graffito on the plaza outside:
Un jour je serai de retour pr√®s de toi

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing. Stare grimly into the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing. Stare grimly into the flames.

fields.Title: ONE DAY I WILL RETURN TO YOUR SIDE: "Slowly the flames subside, the fuel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Slowly the flames subside, the fuel burning out. The air still smells of mazut -- and springtime.

fields.Title: You: ""YOU'VE BEEN POLICED, MARTINAISE.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "YOU'VE BEEN POLICED, MARTINAISE."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "You *could* buy some smokes, light..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You *could* buy some smokes, light up a ciggy and throw it in there... You know, just to see what happens. See if it's flammable. It's better that way. Safer.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "The return of light."
fields.Dialogue Text: The return of light.

fields.Title: ONE DAY I WILL RETURN TO YOUR SIDE: "The red-dyed fuel oil glistens. Thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The red-dyed fuel oil glistens. This was painted very recently.

fields.Title: You: "Looks like Cindy the SKULL has been..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like Cindy the SKULL has been here.
fields.Alternate1: "Looks like Cindy the SKULL has been here."

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "No. Nope. No-no-no, bad idea."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. Nope. No-no-no, bad idea.

fields.Title: You: "Does this have anything to do with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Does this have anything to do with 'The Return' Klaasje is waiting for?
fields.Alternate1: Does this have anything to do with The Return Katarzine Alasije is waiting for?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "The return to her side."
fields.Dialogue Text: The return to her side.

fields.Title: You: ""Step back, lieutenant." (Set the g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Step back, lieutenant." (Set the graffito on fire with a lit cigarette.)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItemGroup("smokes")  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["TASK.light_graffito_on_fire_done"] == false  and  Variable["plaza.graffito_interfacing_fire"]

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Spoken as the something that will o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Spoken as the something that will one day return? Or as the someone who's waiting?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Or some other hoodlum. This is sti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Or some other hoodlum. This is still fresh. It wasn't here yesterday."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Could be. In Revachol West, someon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Could be. In Revachol West, someone somewhere is always whispering about Le Retour..." He squints his eyes at the writing. "It's an *aerograffito*, meant for Coalition aerostatics in the lower troposphere."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Heavy fuel oil -- isn't that... fla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Heavy fuel oil -- isn't that... flammable?

fields.Title: You: "Set the graffito on fire with a lit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Set the graffito on fire with a lit cigarette.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItemGroup("smokes")  and  IsKimHere() == false  and  Variable["TASK.light_graffito_on_fire_done"] == false  and  Variable["plaza.graffito_interfacing_fire"]

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Okay. Sorry. Hooh. Close call."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay. Sorry. Hooh. Close call.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Fresh blood. The return to her side..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fresh blood. The return to her side.

fields.Title: ONE DAY I WILL RETURN TO YOUR SIDE: "The flames warm your face. Then --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The flames warm your face. Then -- a gust of cold wind, and the fire falters...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Time to crack this case. Let's rea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Time to crack this case. Let's really, really have a close look at that window in Klaasje's room."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Of what and to whom, you think? Spo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of what and to whom, you think? Spoken as the something that will one day return? Or as the someone who's waiting?

fields.Title: ONE DAY I WILL RETURN TO YOUR SIDE: "The fuel oil catches fire immediate..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The fuel oil catches fire immediately with an ominous hiss -- a bright orange flash across the surface of the letters. Black smoke rises from the burning message.
fields.Alternate1: The fuel oil catches fire immediately, with a low hiss -- a bright orange flash across the surface of the lettering. Rain turns to vapour above the burning message, mingling with the black smoke.
fields.Alternate2: The fuel oil catches fire immediately, with a low hiss -- a bright orange flash across the surface of the lettering. The falling snow turns to vapour above the burning message, mingling with the black smoke.

fields.Title: Empathy: "The flames warmed him too. Not at a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The flames warmed him too. Not at all in a bad way.

fields.Title: You: ""Does this have anything to do with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Does this have anything to do with 'The Return' Klaasje is waiting for?"
fields.Alternate1: "Does this have anything to do with The Return our Katarzine Alasije is waiting for?"
fields.Alternate2: "Does this have anything to do with The Return our Miss Oranje is waiting for?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The Return..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Return...

fields.Title: You: "Does this have anything to do with'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Does this have anything to do with' The Return' Klaasje was waiting for?
fields.Alternate1: Does this have anything to do with The Return Katarzine Alasije was waiting for?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go to that island.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's go to that island."

fields.Title: ONE DAY I WILL RETURN TO YOUR SIDE: "And blood. Some of it may even be y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And blood. Some of it may even be yours. Looks like a giant mop was used to turn it into lettering...

fields.Title: You: "I smell heavy fuel oil."
fields.Dialogue Text: I smell heavy fuel oil.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant crouches, touching t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant crouches, touching the fuel oil with his finger.

fields.Title: You: ""GOD. I'M ON MY WAY.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "GOD. I'M ON MY WAY."

fields.Title: You: ""Does this have anything to do with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Does this have anything to do with 'The Return' Klaasje was waiting for?"
fields.Alternate1: "Does this have anything to do with The Return our Katarzine Alasije was waiting for?"
fields.Alternate2: "Does this have anything to do with The Return our Miss Oranje was waiting for?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "What if the words are not directed..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What if the words are not directed at the people of Martinaise, or even the Coalition aerostatics above the city -- they're meant for something above even those...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant has taken a small st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant has taken a small step back. He looks at your face illuminated by the flames and nods silently. Then the fire falters...

fields.Title: Shivers: "IT'S TIME TO GO TO THE ISLAND."
fields.Dialogue Text: IT'S TIME TO GO TO THE ISLAND.

fields.Title: You: "Looks like Cindy the SKULL finally..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like Cindy the SKULL finally found the words for her masterpiece.
fields.Alternate1: "Looks like Cindy the SKULL finally found the words for her masterpiece."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And blood. Some of it is even your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And blood. Some of it is even yours."

fields.Title: You: "What are you trying to imply, finge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What are you trying to imply, fingers?

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "This was Cindy the SKULL."
fields.Dialogue Text: This was Cindy the SKULL.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: ONE DAY I WILL RETURN TO YOUR SIDE: "The graffito has been painted over..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The graffito has been painted over the traces of the fight that took place here. It smells of blood and heavy fuel oil.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like it, yes. This is still..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like it, yes. This is still fresh. It wasn't here yesterday."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant crouches, touching t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant crouches, touching the fuel oil with his finger.

fields.Title: You: ""DISCO ELYSIUM.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "DISCO ELYSIUM."

fields.Title: Logic: "It's time to crack this case. The n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's time to crack this case. The next logical move is to go back upstairs, to Klaasje's room. Really inspect that window.
